sentences.english: After all, we cannot drink poison to quench thirst when it comes to jobs.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，解决就业难的问题，千万不能饮鸩止渴。

sentences.english: Someone once said that anger is like drinking poison and hoping your enemy will die.
sentences.chinese: 有人曾经说过愤怒就像饮鸩止渴而希望敌人会死去。

sentences.english: The remedy is worse than the, cannot because thirsty run drink poison.
sentences.chinese: 饮鸩止渴，不能因为口渴就拼命喝毒药。

sentences.english: To cut science funding in order to cut the deficit is actually self-defeating.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少赤字而削减科技经费无异于饮鸩止渴。
